meanings.definition: A mineral pitch or bitumen found in natural deposits.
meanings.sent1: The workers dug deep to extract the asphaltites from the earth.
meanings.sent2: The road was paved with asphaltites to make it smooth and durable.
meanings.sent3: The kids mistook the asphaltites for chocolate and tried to take a bite!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was as strong and enduring as asphaltites.
meanings.sent5: The smell of asphaltites lingered in the air long after the road was laid.

meanings.definition: A black or brownish-black solid or semisolid mixture of hydrocarbons obtained from petroleum.
meanings.sent1: The factory processed the asphaltites to create various petroleum products.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used asphaltites to lubricate the machinery and keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled asphaltites into the soup, creating a unique flavor!
meanings.sent4: His voice was as deep and rich as the color of asphaltites.
meanings.sent5: The artist used asphaltites to create a striking contrast in the painting.
